        java.lang.String create​(java.lang.String name,

                        boolean publicGroup,

        https://groups.roblox.com/docs#!/Groups/post_v1_groups_create NOTE: This endpoint will charge Robux for the group purchase.
        Parameters:
        name - Group name
        description - Group description
        publicGroup - Is the group public
        buildersClubMembersOnly - Only allow Builder's Club Members
        files - A file to upload (icon)

        Group Info
